item.title: Get Rid of MySQL Error 1290 in Mac
item.description: Many people who use MySQL 8.0 might encounter the 1290 issue. I have done some research online and the method discussed in this post may help you to solve the problem. copy the code below to terminal and input the password to open MySQL: /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysql -uroot -p On the right top conner click the serach icon and type terminal, in case you don’t know how to open a terminal.
